testcase.name: Positive - Creation of service type
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into OpenMRS to add service type...................passed When the user clicks on Appointment Scheduling..............................passed Then the user should be directed to "OpenMRS Electronic Medical Record" page.passed When the user clicks on Manage Service Types................................passed And clicks on new service type..............................................passed And enters details:.........................................................passed And clicks on save button...................................................passed Then the user should be directed to "Manage Service Types"..................passed

testcase.name: Negative - creation of duplicate service type
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into OpenMRS to add service type...................passed When the user clicks on Appointment Scheduling..............................passed Then the user should be directed to "OpenMRS Electronic Medical Record" page.passed When the user clicks on Manage Service Types................................passed And clicks on new service type..............................................passed And enters details:.........................................................passed And clicks on save button...................................................passed Then user should see a message "Name is duplicated".........................passed

testcase.name: Positive Testcase- Registration of patient with all details
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into OpenMRS to register a patient.................passed When the user clicks on Register a Patient..................................passed Then the user should be directed to "OpenMRS Electronic Medical Record" page.passed And the user enters new patient details:....................................passed And the user clicks on submit button........................................passed Then the user should see "Patient ID" text..................................passed

testcase.name: Negative Testcase- Attempt to register patient with missing fields
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into OpenMRS to register a patient.................passed When the user clicks on Register a Patient..................................passed Then the user should be directed to "OpenMRS Electronic Medical Record" page.passed And the user enters few patient details:....................................passed And I should see a validation error for "Given Name"........................passed

testcase.name: Positive Case - Finding a valid patient record
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into OpenMRS to find a patient record..............passed When the user clicks on Find Patient Record.................................passed Then the user should be directed to "OpenMRS Electronic Medical Record" page.passed When the user enters patient name and click on details......................passed Then the user should see a record with patient name.........................passed

testcase.name: Negative Case - Attempt to find a invalid patient record
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into OpenMRS to find a patient record..............passed When the user clicks on Find Patient Record.................................passed Then the user should be directed to "OpenMRS Electronic Medical Record" page.passed When the user enters patient name and click on details......................passed Then the user should see "No matching records found"........................passed

testcase.name: Positive - Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the OpenMRS login page.................................passed When the user enters username "admin" password "Admin123" selects session "Registration Desk".passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed Then the user should be directed to "Home" page.............................passed

testcase.name: Negative - Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the OpenMRS login page.................................passed When the user enters username "invaliduser" password "invalidpassword" selects session "Registration Desk".passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed Then the user should be directed to "Login" page............................passed And an error message "Invalid username/password. Please try again." should be displayed.passed
